QuestData.Title: Halp!
QuestData.Description:
I need halp!
I am To'no and I was exploring cuz that is what I am good at but I did not realize my sister Ko followed me and I need you to halp me find her cuz she is in trouble so please halp please?
She went into this cave but she is not as good at hiding as I am and our parents are too far away to halp.
Can you find her before the monsters do?
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return the children to their parents.
